<p>Workday gone bad? Watching <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/vsure"><strong>vSure</strong></a> build his way towards lengthy space excursions is a sure bet that your day will go by that much quicker. Subscribe to his <strong><a href="http://www.twitch.tv/vsure">channel</a></strong> and enjoy the scientific goodness.</p>
